trans-unit.source: If the Network Server is running (whether it was started by initializing the servlet or in some other manner), the running page is displayed.

seg-source.mrk: If the Network Server is running (whether it was started by initializing the servlet or in some other manner), the running page is displayed.

target.mrk: If the Network Server is running (whether it was started by initializing the servlet or in some other manner), the running page is displayed.

trans-unit.source: The running page indicates whether logging is on or off, whether tracing is on or off, and if tracing is on, indicates for which session.

seg-source.mrk: The running page indicates whether logging is on or off, whether tracing is on or off, and if tracing is on, indicates for which session.

target.mrk: The running page indicates whether logging is on or off, whether tracing is on or off, and if tracing is on, indicates for which session.

trans-unit.source: You can use the running page to stop the server and turn logging and tracing on or off. The following options are available from the running page:

seg-source.mrk: You can use the running page to stop the server and turn logging and tracing on or off.
The following options are available from the running page:

target.mrk: You can use the running page to stop the server and turn logging and tracing on or off.
The following options are available from the running page:

trans-unit.source: Start or stop tracing all sessions.

seg-source.mrk: Start or stop tracing all sessions.

target.mrk: Start or stop tracing all sessions.

trans-unit.source: Specify session to trace. (If you choose this option, the Trace session page is displayed.)

seg-source.mrk: (If you choose this option, the Trace session page is displayed.)

target.mrk: (If you choose this option, the Trace session page is displayed.)

trans-unit.source: Change tracing directory. (If you choose this option, the Trace directory page is displayed.)

seg-source.mrk: (If you choose this option, the Trace directory page is displayed.)

target.mrk: (If you choose this option, the Trace directory page is displayed.)

trans-unit.source: Specify threading parameters for the Network Server. (If you choose this option, the Thread parameters page is displayed.)

seg-source.mrk: Specify threading parameters for the Network Server.
(If you choose this option, the Thread parameters page is displayed.)

target.mrk: Specify threading parameters for the Network Server.
(If you choose this option, the Thread parameters page is displayed.)
